availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Ward Jean (Jefferson County, Kentucky, saddler. )

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, saddler. Jefferson County, Kentucky, native. Son of William P. Jean and Catharine Myers Jean. Married to Sarah Seaton Jean in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on February 11, 1847. Father of George N. Jean, William C. Jean, Jesse S. Jean, Myers S. Jean, Alice Jean Mills, Lucretia Jean, Lula Jean Mills, Leonora Jean, and Clarence Jean. Saddler in Jefferson County in 1850. Saddler in Jefferson County in 1860.
